description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A Hardcore HD race to the Finish!   Streamline is the racing genre re-defined. Guide your Streamline through the maze of levels. Quick reflexes are key to mastering Streamline. Find the fastest route to beat the opposition - but use your energy and boost wisely!  Adrenaline Packed Racing Action!
description.short: A Hardcore HD race to the Finish!   Streamline is the racing genre re-defined. Guide your Streamline through the maze of levels. Quick reflexes are key to mastering Streamline.
